thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 48 of 3060
thread.title: Duncan Monro

author: Duncan Monro
title: Duncan Monro
text:
I have only made the booking so far, actually 2 separate bookings - that process went pretty smoothly, although for one booking I thought it said pay 10% deposit on booking and balance at time of car hire, yet whole amount came out of my account immediately.
The proof of how good the service will be is when we pick up the car - if that all works out well, then the process will have been a great success
